sentences.en: For protein crystallization, the main impact of precipitant is on the solvent.
sentences.cn: 对于蛋白质的结晶，沉淀剂主要在溶剂上产生作用。

sentences.en: It'shows that good produce can be synthesized by using algin as precipitant.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,用草酸氨做沉淀剂可以得到结构和形态比较好的产品.

sentences.en: Nano ZrO 2 was prepared by sol - gel method with ZrOCl 2·8 H 2 O as ingredient and ammonia as precipitant.
sentences.cn: 以廉价无机盐八水氧氯化锆为原料,用氨水作沉淀剂,采用溶胶 — 凝胶法制备纳米级二氧化锆.

sentences.en: The results show that different kinds of precipitant have a great impact on phytin yield.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:沉淀剂的变化对菲汀收率的影响非常显著.

sentences.en: Today, we should develop kind of drive more, develop ceaselessly in new journey, never complacent, precipitant.
sentences.cn: 今天, 我们更应发扬这种精神,在新的征途中不断开拓, 永不自满, 勇往直前.
